name: The Secret of Tikal
description:
Maked for the Ludum Dare 36: Ancient Technology

Following the theme we decided to make game based on the Maya's civilization but adding some mystical stuff. In the game two chiefs from rival tribes are fighting for recovering an ancient technology hidden in a tomb defended by a guardian totem.

It's a two player game. Take the gem and exit through the door!

We wanted to add more traps and mechanisms but It has not been possible. It was our first Jam and the game was made in 48h by Marta, Fernando and me.

Controls:

Player 1 -> WASD

Player 2 -> Keyboard arrows

(It should work with gamepads too but there's some problem with the WebGL version).

Enjoy it!
